name: Weekly Specials
description: Experience our rotating selection of seasonal dishes, featuring the freshest ingredients from the market.

name: Chef's Table Series
description: An intimate 7-course tasting menu served at the kitchen counter, personally guided by Chef Elena Sato.

name: Sonoma Winemaker Dinner
description: Join us for an exclusive evening featuring a vertical tasting of Pinot Noir paired with a 5-course menu.
